Articles.Content: I'm having trouble closing the Mk16 parachute pressure and altitude menu. Whenever I have the menu selected and I click circle to close it, the game takes me back to the parts menu and doesn't close the parachute menu.

17 hours ago, O1h_2007 said:

I'm having trouble closing the Mk16 parachute pressure and altitude menu. Whenever I have the menu selected and I click circle to close it, the game takes me back to the parts menu and doesn't close the parachute menu. 

I had the same problem, I just gave up and started making rockets. My first rocket was... What you can call "Overkill" but never made it above 7,000 meters due to instability

Well, if all else fails, try switching to the Radial control preset. In the Radial preset you click Square on a part to open its Part Action Window or click Square anywhere in open space to close windows.
